title: User Profile

universalCredentialsDescription: Manage your universal database connection credentials. These credentials will be used for all database connections, providing a single set of authentication details for permissions synchronization.
noUniversalCredentials: You don't have universal database credentials configured yet.

universalCredentialsForm.description: These credentials will be used for all database connections. Make sure you have the same username and password across all your database servers.

requiredCredentials.title: Database Credentials Required
requiredCredentials.warning: You must set up your database credentials before using the system
requiredCredentials.description: To ensure proper synchronization and access to database resources, you need to set up your universal database credentials. These will be used for all operations across the system.

credentialsForm.usernameHelp: Your username will be used across all databases
credentialsForm.passwordHelp: Password must be strong and secure

error.invalidPassword: Password does not meet security requirements

credentialsForm.title: Universal Database Credentials
credentialsForm.description: These credentials will be used for all database connections. Make sure you have the same username and password across all your database servers.

credentialsDescription: Manage your database connection credentials. These credentials are used for user and permission synchronization between DB-Manager and your database servers.
